testcase.classname: Users should be able to signup with their information
testcase.name: User register with their data - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to home page................................................passed And User closes popup.......................................................passed And User clicks on Account..................................................passed And User clicks on sign in..................................................passed When User enters email address "abdullah29204@hotmail.com"..................passed And User clicks on first continue...........................................passed And User fills password "@Bdullah1234"......................................passed And User fills confirm password "@Bdullah1234"..............................passed And User clicks on second continue..........................................passed And User enters first name "Abdullah" and last name "Mostafa" and "01223344556".passed And User clicks on third continue...........................................passed And User selects gender "M".................................................passed And User selects birthdate "02-27-1992".....................................passed And User accepts terms and conditions.......................................passed And User clicks on fourth continue..........................................passed Then User logout from his account...........................................passed

testcase.classname: User could login Successfully to their accounts , shopping and add selected items to the cart
testcase.name: User could login with valid data successfully - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to home page................................................passed And User clicks on Account..................................................passed And User clicks on sign in..................................................passed And User enters email address "abdullah29204@hotmail.com"...................passed And User clicks on first continue...........................................passed And User fills password "@Bdullah1234"......................................passed And User clicks on fifth continue...........................................passed Then User goes to home page.................................................passed And User hovers to SuperMarket..............................................passed And User selects Bakery.....................................................passed And User adds first item to the cart "TODO".................................passed And User adds second item to the cart "Lino"................................passed And User goes to Cart page..................................................passed Then User checks for items availability.....................................passed And User check for price accuracy...........................................passed
